title: Me while reading through all Dynamic Queue complaints
body:
http://i.imgur.com/Oty0OFJ.jpg

Edit: Actually it's a lot more than 11 now.

replies.body: You know, as long as i win and lose about an even amount I DON'T CARE IF IT'S SOLO QUEUE OR DYNAMIC QUEUE they're both good enough for me. and if all the salty players quit league then the game will probably get more fun
For me is "as long as I have fun" and that means also having a fair enviroment where to play. DQ doesn't seem to offer that from a personal point of view.
I still win and lose about the same amount all i'm saying is that if it really is THAT BIG of a problem i think i would have run into it by now
It's a bigger problem the higher you go.
kinda like the voices in my head
...explain.
the higher i get the worse the voices in my head get
...I'm willing to up-vote cause I got a smile out of it which is relativly rare for those kinds of jokes. good job.
I did my job right then.

Meh, for now i am content, when i get there ill start baby raging like everybody else. 
https://media.giphy.com/media/3oEduQgyEr6wev9c3K/giphy.gif
I suppose that's decent logic...what's with the shots fired thing? I do not comprehend.
I said everyone complaining was baby ragers
oh...I dunno if I should agree with that statement or not. I will say it's justified that they're like that.
Your account is unranked, and the only games in your match history i see are bots games and rotation games....have you played a single game of dynamicQ? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Well, I've had matches that I hated from the bottom of my heart and still won them while having some matches which I loved even if in the end I lost them. While ofc having a balance between winning and losing is a big factor I do believe that first thing is to have a proper and non-toxic enviroment and then care about win/lose ratio.

Yeah, Dairy Queen is garbage mcdownalds and wendy are better.
Also dynamic queue is fine, people are just bitching. 
"Return ranked to its former glory." I haven't gotten matched with one troll since dynamic queue was introduced and i had a troll in 6/10 in my season 5 placements. Also people can ASK in a game if anybody wants to discord so that you can have better communication, not that hard people.
I still get trolls just not as much this season.

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rZzymdcQ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-01T12:51:25.009+0000)
>
> For me is "as long as I have fun" and that means also having a fair enviroment where to play. DQ doesn't seem to offer that from a personal point of view.

Thank you, been saying this for months...
 
I'm now going to say something and I know the LoL sheep will rip me a new asshole for this, but it's the truth: my winrate has seen a MASSIVE decline due to DQ. Last season, I managed to hit plat after more than 600 ranked games and a 51 or 52% win ratio. This season, I'm stuck in gold 5 (a full tier lower than my end point of the previous season) with a 43% win ratio. These are statistics. There is no opinion here. This is fact. I'm very much aware that meta shifts do mess with win/loss ratio, but never in my 4 and a half years of playing this game I have never had a dip in win rate this dramatic. Even the juggernaut patch last summer didn't affect me this much, and that shit legit scared me out of ranked for a while. And before anyone cites the new mage update as the reason for my dip in win rate, I pretty much stopped playing as soon as it went live. 

I'm honestly not sure if I am going to continue playing this game, which is very saddening, as it is the only medium in which I and some of my college friends still interact, and it was by far the best competitive game I have ever really invested in. Now it's complete trash and this both angers and disheartens me. Way to go Riot, keep on fucking up and calling it "progress".

4 and a half years of playing, only hit platinum after 600 damn games in the 4th season playing. 

Sorry man, but you're just absolute trash. I mean, holy fuck, 600 games. That's A LOT of games played, the fact that you only got plat with that is...whatever...Scapegoating DQ for being bad won't get you anywhere. 

I got a 4.0 GPA when bush was president, now that obama's president I can hardly  hit a 3.0!!! omg obama lowering my GPA?? fact??? omg??? These are statistics!! no opinion here!! Obama is lowering my GPA america why you so bad company plz!?!!

I'm confused. You are currently a gold 5 player (as am I) and you are insulting me for having attained a higher rank than you. Never have I been so confounded by the boundlessness of human stupidity.

Oh, and btw, thanks for this absolute gem:
>Scapegoating DQ for being bad won't get you anywhere. 

When in your previous comment you said:
>You obviously have not experienced the hell of solo Q in low elo. At least with DQ, you can have a slight chance of winning; in solo Q, that one kid who thinks he's cool that completely fucks you over in every way shape and form disables you from even having a chance at winning the game.

I spy a salty hypocrite.
in my games of ranked (i think its 20?) this season ive only had 1 4 man premade and it was on my team.
how so?

Me when seeing (anti) Dynamic Queue threads covering the front page

http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/Homer-Walks-Into-Bar-and-Leaves.gif
I feel like with the recent video from Riot, Those who are making the posts about F U Riot for not bringing back Solo Queue only watched like 5 min of it
Are you talking about the sheer amount of Dynamic Queue threads or the Boards always finding something to focus their complaints about and then posting 100 threads about it?
Yes.
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/3b/3b6442e512cad28d0f4e1f028f0eb2f3b8cf586d8407adfc5f16d85ed6183b1c.jpg
Logged in to downvote
Was already logged in, only had to downvote

> [{quoted}](name=Telenus,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rZzymdcQ,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-06-01T19:35:54.367+0000)
>
> Logged in to downvote

There's no point to these kind of replies. You're just trying to get attention, and it's in a really rude way. I don't agree with most of the dynamic queue complaint threads, but saying "Logged in just to downvote this." is really rude and contributes _nothing_ to discussion. The Boards are a place for discussion, and by saying that, you are discouraging it.

> [{quoted}](name=Aeszarck,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rZzymdcQ,comment-id=000f0001,timestamp=2016-06-01T20:57:05.393+0000)
>
> The Boards are a place for discussion, and by saying that, you are discouraging it.

BAHAHAHAHAHAHA!  Oh man, my sides weren't ready for that.

In all seriousness, if people like you become the majority here, there's hope for the boards yet.

Also, I've seen your posts around the Boards. I like your sense of humor and agree with many of your opinions, so it's cool to hear that from you.

ALSO,
[This post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/3TK1oiEE-this-is-why-i-am-quitting-league-of-legends-every-match-is-either-with-or-against-premades?comment=0005) of yours was _golden_.

Improving the boards is a daily fight against shitposting.  All it takes for the same tired threads and opinions being echo-chambered is for folks like us to just let it happen.  There are tons of people who post dissenting opinions here who get shouted down by overly vocal toxics on here,  and I want it to stop.   I don't care if people disagree with our opinions but just be goddamn respectful.

Improving the boards is a win win for us,  the community as a whole,  and for Riot as well.   I quite frankly don't care if anyone agrees with my opinions or not,  but I am appreciative of you wanting to better these forums, and while being a smartass is my forte, I'm also appreciative of you giving respect to other people as well (something that I could always do a little more of).  Either way, kudos.

> [{quoted}](name=Remlap1223,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rZzymdcQ,comment-id=000f0001000000010000,timestamp=2016-06-02T00:41:01.901+0000)

There are tons of people who post dissenting opinions here who get shouted down by overly vocal toxics on here,  and I want it to stop.   I don't care if people disagree with our opinions but just be goddamn respectful.

This is why I like your posts. That felt satisfying to read, right there.
I don't post too much because I feel somewhat nervous about voicing my opinions on more controversial topics, but now I feel _motivated_. Thank you,
> Improving the boards is a win win for us,  the community as a whole,  and for Riot as well.   I quite frankly don't care if anyone agrees with my opinions or not,  but I am appreciative of you wanting to better these forums, and while being a smartass is my forte, I'm also appreciative of you giving respect to other people as well (something that I could always do a little more of).  Either way, kudos.

So you've seen me around too, I assume.
Yeah, I like complementing people, because I assume other people are like me. To me, the upvotes feel good, but to see that there's an actual person saying "good job/I agree/thank you" or something even more detailed, that makes my day. (Not just for League stuff, for anything.) I'm a pretty normal person, so if I like it, other people probably like it too. So that's why I write out complements. (It's also why I try to keep a really positive atmosphere when I play matches - the other people on my team probably like a positive atmosphere, so I'll do my part in making it so.) I like the cosplays, the art, the well-written analyses, etc. and I want to tell the creators that they did a good job instead of merely upvotes, because that's what I'd want.
I also am hoping that someone sees what I'm doing and starts doing it as well. I'd love to make a player positive because she felt good about my attitude and had the insight to start being positive herself. I'd also love to make a Boards poster more logical, less hateful because he saw what I was doing.
However, sometimes there are people that just really piss me off. These aren't the people that I'm trying to convince, because I doubt they'll change. I don't think that Dominick Destine is going to quit being an obnoxious jerk who insults Riot at every turn and makes the weirdest threads asking about Evelynn's voice actor. I don't think TheLittlestLulu is going to stop being a fountain of pure vitriol. These are people I'd like to just _bash_ on their respective threads and hopefully get at least ONE person to see that they're wrong and mean. However, they have so many _fans_, fans who just latch on to the Riot hate train, and I don't feel like getting buried in vain. Because who knows if I'll convince anyone?

The only way I'll know is if someone comments.

Sometimes I wonder why people need to make an entirely new thread that involves one or two sentences and farm upvotes when they can just contribute to an already existing thread that's clearly appropriate and on-topic.

Oh wait, I just answered my own question.

Mfw people still bitch about DynaQ
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/456/960/d5e.jpg
That's not going to stop the haters from hating en masse
Especially if the prospect is free upvotes.
It's pretty much the same thing with "I'm leaving, guys! I'm really gonna do it this time!" posts

In the Video, Lobbster, the main dev for DynamicQ said : "we never had that much peoples playing ranked right now" to trying to tell us there never been that much players playing since DynamicQ come out like it was a great thing. 

 well no shit sherlock whats left? 

SoloQ GONE, Ranked's 5 GONE, TwistedTreeline ranked GONE, TeamBuilder GONE, Dominon GONE. 

is it me or the next STEP is League of Legend GONE.

Im sorry the matchmaking is woeful...dynamic Q only made it worse. I actually had a guy on my team that didnt know what a Promo was...that same person thought Everyone else on the team was the "jerks" because we questioned warlords bloodlust on KARTHUS...MID..AP Karthus Mid....Warlords Bloodlust...Beuler? We didnt even flame, we just asked, and he lost his mind. then later asked "what are promos?" "do you mean pornos?" and he was serious.

his apparent lack of understanding of the game added to my suspicion that he was legitimately matched inappropriately..i understand im silver right now, and somebody out there is going to yell at me and flash their diamond or platinum badge at me then pummel my face in dirt..but you cant get out of bronze with warlords bloodlust on ap karthus, unless youre challenger smurf trolling...he was not in anyway smurfing..trust


its not just high elo that dynamic Q and this matchmaking farq up are ruining the game. its everywhere.

i have also waited  25 minutes for a secondary role in silver, and my buddy has waited longer in bronze. this 5 minute average Q time is a lie.
